instructions:
Pat the fish fillets dry. Beat egg white in a shallow pan until slightly frothy. Dip fillets in egg on flesh
side only and lay egg moistened side up on wax paper. Sprinkle heavily with sesame seeds. Heat shallow
pan in 500 F oven for 5 minutes. Mix olive and sesame oil, add to hot pan and swirl around to coat. Place
fish seed side down in pan and return to oven to bake for about 8 minutes or until thickest part of fish is
opaque when cut. Transfer fillets to warm plates seed side up. Have a mixture of melted butter, lemon juice,
and soy sauce available.
ingredients: 1 lb flounder (orange roughy or haddock) fillets
name: Sesame Fish Fillets
